metadata.notes: Master schema template v2. One example entry per category shows ALL valid fields. Omit fields that are not applicable — do not null-fill everything. The 'compatibility' block on each component is what the compatibility engine reads to flag conflicts.

frames.name: Example Frame 5 inch
frames._vehicle_type_options: quad | hex | octo | tricopter | fixed_wing | flying_wing | vtol | coaxial
frames._arm_configuration_options: true-X | stretched-X | deadcat | H-frame | V-tail | flying-wing | Y6 | X8 | other
frames._material_options: carbon_fiber | aluminum | glass_fiber | plastic | foam | wood | EPO | EPP | hybrid
frames._fc_mounting_notes: List of supported FC/stack mounting hole spacing in mm. Common: 16, 20, 25.5, 30.5, 35, 45.
frames._camera_mount_size_options: nano (14mm) | micro (22mm) | mini (26mm) | standard (28mm) | fixed | none

motors.name: Example Motor 2207 1980KV
motors._motor_mount_notes: Mounting hole spacing in mm. Common: 9, 12, 16, 19. Match to frame motor mount.

servos.name: Example Servo Digital Metal Gear Micro
servos.description: Digital metal gear micro servo for fixed-wing control surfaces

fc._mcu_options: STM32F405 | STM32F411 | STM32F722 | STM32F745 | STM32F765 | STM32H743 | AT32F435 | GD32F405 | iMXRT1062
fc._imu_options: MPU6000 | MPU6500 | ICM20689 | ICM42688P | ICM42605 | BMI270 | BMI088 | LSM6DSO
fc._barometer_options: BMP280 | BMP388 | DPS310 | MS5611 | SPL06 | null
fc._motor_protocol_options: DSHOT150 | DSHOT300 | DSHOT600 | DSHOT1200 | Bidirectional_DSHOT | Multishot | Oneshot125 | Oneshot42 | PWM
fc._firmware_options: Betaflight | iNav | Ardupilot | KISS | Emuflight | Cleanflight

esc._esc_firmware_options: BLHeli_S | BLHeli_32 | AM32 | KISS | Bluejay | proprietary
esc._input_connector_options: BT2.0 | PH2.0 | JST-PHR | XT30 | XT60 | XT60H | XT90 | XT90-S | solder_pads

flight_controllers.name: Example Standalone F7 Flight Controller
flight_controllers.description: Standalone F7 FC, no ESC included

pdbs.name: Example PDB 500A
pdbs.description: High-current power distribution board for X-Class or cinelifter
pdbs._input_connector_options: XT60 | XT90 | XT90-S | AS150 | EC8 | solder_pads

voltage_regulators.name: Example Ultra Small 5V Booster
voltage_regulators.description: High-power 5V boost regulator for video/digital systems

batteries.name: Example 6S 1300mAh 160C LiPo XT60
batteries._chemistry_options: LiPo | LiHV | Li-ion_18650 | Li-ion_21700 | LiFePO4 | NiMH | semi_solid_state
batteries._battery_connector_options: BT2.0 | PH2.0 | JST-PHR | XT30 | XT30U | XT60 | XT60H | XT90 | XT90-S | AS150 | EC3 | EC5 | EC8 | XT150

battery_chargers.name: Example 4-Channel 250W Smart Charger
battery_chargers.description: 4-port AC/DC smart balance charger with display
battery_chargers._display_options: color_LCD | IPS_LCD | mono_LCD | OLED | LED | none

propellers.name: Example 5.1x2.75 Tri-Blade
propellers._material_options: polycarbonate | nylon | PA12 | nylon_glass_fiber | carbon_fiber | flexible_PC
propellers._hub_type_options: standard | T-mount | press_fit_1.5mm | press_fit_2mm | press_fit_3mm | butterfly_5mm

fpv_cameras.name: Example Analog FPV Camera 1200TVL
fpv_cameras.description: High-resolution analog FPV camera with starlight sensor

digital_video_cameras.name: Example Digital FPV Camera HD
digital_video_cameras.description: Digital HD FPV camera for Walksnail Avatar system
digital_video_cameras._digital_system_options: DJI_O3 | DJI_O4 | DJI_O4_Lite | DJI_O4_Pro | HDZero | Walksnail_Avatar | OpenHD

action_cameras.name: Example Action Camera 4K
action_cameras.description: Waterproof action camera with electronic stabilization
action_cameras._naked_mod_notes: Whether PCB can be extracted to reduce weight (popular for GoPro Hero 6/7/8/9/10/11)

video_transmitters.name: Example Analog 2.5W VTX
video_transmitters._digital_system_options: null | DJI_O3 | DJI_O4 | DJI_O4_Lite | DJI_O4_Pro | HDZero | Walksnail_Avatar | OpenHD
video_transmitters._5ghz_band_options: A (Boscam) | B (Boscam) | E (Boscam) | F/Airwave | R/Raceband | L/Lowband | H (DJI) | Race
video_transmitters._antenna_connector_options: SMA | RP-SMA | MMCX | U.FL | IPEX4 | SMA_right_angle

video_transmitters.name: Example Digital Air Unit O4
video_transmitters.description: DJI O4 digital video transmission air unit

video_transmitters.name: Example Optical Fiber FPV 5km
video_transmitters.description: Fiber optic FPV video and data link, 5km range, zero RF interference

fpv_goggles.name: Example HD Box Goggle
fpv_goggles.description: Dual-system box goggles: HDZero digital + analog
fpv_goggles._digital_system_options: DJI_O3 | DJI_O4 | DJI_O4_Pro | HDZero | Walksnail_Avatar | OpenHD | analog

antennas._antenna_type_options: omni | directional | patch | panel | yagi | helical | dipole | cloverleaf | mushroom | lollipop | pagoda | stubby
antennas._use_case_options: vtx | vrx | rc_link_tx | rc_link_rx | gps | wifi | multi
antennas._connector_options: SMA_male | SMA_female | RP-SMA_male | RP-SMA_female | MMCX | U.FL | IPEX4 | N_type

ground_antennas.name: Example 5.8GHz Directional Panel Ground Antenna
ground_antennas.description: High-gain directional flat-panel antenna for ground station

receivers.description: Lightweight 2.4GHz ExpressLRS receiver with U.FL antenna
receivers._rc_protocol_options: ELRS | CRSF_Crossfire | CRSF_Tracer | FrSky_ACCST_D8 | FrSky_ACCST_D16 | FrSky_ACCESS | FlySky_AFHDS | FlySky_AFHDS2A | DSMX | DSM2 | DSMR | GHST_Ghost | PWM | SBUS | iBUS | SUMD | SRXL2 | Futaba_FASST | Futaba_SFHSS
receivers._fc_interface_options: UART_CRSF | UART_ELRS | UART_GHST | SBUS | FPORT | FBUS | PPM | iBUS | SUMD | SRXL2 | PWM | DSMX
receivers._antenna_type_options: dipole | PCB_trace | whip | chip | diversity | ceramic_patch
receivers._antenna_connector_options: U.FL | IPEX1 | IPEX4 | SMA | RP-SMA | integrated

transmitters.name: Example Full-Size Radio Controller 2.4GHz ELRS
transmitters.description: Full-size OpenTX/EdgeTX radio with internal ELRS module
transmitters._protocol_options: ELRS | CRSF_Crossfire | CRSF_Tracer | FrSky_ACCST | FrSky_ACCESS | FlySky_AFHDS2A | DSMX | GHST | multi_protocol | PWM

rf_modules.name: Example ELRS 915MHz External TX Module
rf_modules.description: External 915MHz ExpressLRS JR module for longer range

gps_modules.name: Example GPS M10 with Compass
gps_modules.description: u-blox M10 GPS with integrated compass for iNav/ArduPilot
gps_modules._gps_chip_options: u-blox_M6 | u-blox_M8 | u-blox_M9 | u-blox_M10 | CASIC | Quectel_L76 | AT6558 | MTK_MT3333
gps_modules._compass_options: HMC5883L | QMC5883L | IST8310 | IIS2MDC | LIS3MDL | null

optical_flow_sensors.name: Example Optical Flow + Rangefinder Module
optical_flow_sensors.description: Combined optical flow and lidar rangefinder for indoor hovering

rangefinders.name: Example Lidar Rangefinder
rangefinders.description: TFmini lidar for altitude hold and obstacle detection

capacitors.name: Example 1000uF 35V Low ESR Capacitor
capacitors.description: Low-ESR electrolytic cap for ESC power smoothing
capacitors._voltage_notes: Must be rated >= max battery voltage. 6S max = 25.2V. Use 35V+ for 6S, 63V+ for 8S.

buzzers.name: Example Active Buzzer 5V
buzzers.description: Active piezo buzzer for lost model alarm

led_strips.name: Example WS2812B LED Strip 8 LEDs
led_strips.description: Addressable RGB LED strip for night flying and aesthetics

connector_adapters.name: Example XT60 Male to XT30 Female Adapter
connector_adapters.description: Adapt XT60 battery to XT30 ESC input
connector_adapters._connector_options: BT2.0 | PH2.0 | JST-PHR | XT30 | XT60 | XT60H | XT90 | XT90-S | AS150 | EC3 | EC5 | EC8

wiring_hardware.name: Example Silicone Wire Kit 14AWG
wiring_hardware.description: High-strand-count silicone insulated wire for power leads
wiring_hardware._hardware_type_options: wire | heat_shrink | battery_strap | zip_tie | standoff | screw_set | prop_nut | velcro | double_sided_tape | foam_padding | o_ring

tools.name: Example FPV Tool Kit with Multimeter
tools.description: Complete FPV quad builder tool kit including soldering iron and multimeter
tools._tool_type_options: kit | soldering_iron | hot_air_station | multimeter | prop_tool | screwdriver | prop_balancer | hex_driver | battery_tester | conformal_coat | practice_board | cnc | 3d_printer | oscilloscope | power_supply

accessories.name: Example Accessory
accessories.description: Catch-all for items that don't fit other categories
accessories._accessory_type_options: canopy | camera_mount | prop_guard | landing_pad | carry_bag | neck_strap | goggle_battery | filament_TPU | filament_PLA | filament_ABS | filament_PETG | filament_ASA | filament_CF | short_saver | drone_model_prebuilt | chassis_surface | wing_foam | misc

drone_models.description: Complete drone model referencing all component PIDs
drone_models._build_class_notes: freestyle | racing | long_range | cinematic | cinewhoop | tiny_whoop | X-class | fixed_wing | flying_wing | micro | nano
